requirement.en: When your opponent Normal Summons an Effect Monster while you have a face-up Level 7 or higher DARK Attribute or FIRE Attribute Dragon Type monster on your field.

effect.en: Change that Normal Summoned monster to face-down Defense Position. Then, if your opponent has 3 or more cards in their hand, you can send 1 random card from their hand to the Graveyard.
